
```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, results='hide', warning=FALSE}

```

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, results='hide', warning=FALSE}
chisq.test(nova$gender, nova$label_content)

CrossTable(nova$member, nova$gender, chisq = T)
```
